resources.string: "Portable Wi-Fi Hotspot can share this phone's Internet connection with your PC via Wi-Fi."
After the Portable Wi-Fi Hotspot is started on this phone, your PC can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
"Wi-Fi tethering can share this phone's Internet connection with your PC via Wi-Fi."
After the Wi-Fi tethering is started on this phone, your PC can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
"Mobile Hotspot can share this phone's Internet connection with your PC via Wi-Fi."
"Sprint Mobile Hotspot can share this phone's Internet connection with your device via Wi-Fi."
After the Hotspot is started on this phone, your device can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
"%s allows you to instantly create a fast Wi-Fi connection using T-Mobile's advanced data network."
Access the Internet from your portable laptop from virtually anywhere!
"PocketWifi™ can share this phone's Internet connection with your PC via Wi-Fi."
After the PocketWifi™ is started on this phone, your PC can connect to it and then start using the Internet.
1. Turn on Wi-Fi on your PC.
4. Start using the Internet on your PC.
1. Enable Wi-Fi on the device you want to connect to your Sprint Mobile Hotspot.
2. Find \"%s\" in the list of Wi-Fi networks.
3. Select \"%s\" and enter \"%s\" in the security key field.
4. Start using the Internet on your device.
3. Select \"%s\" in the list of Wi-Fi networks and enter \"%s\" in the security field.
3. Select \"%s.\" in the list of Wi-Fi networks.
Please type a valid IP address
The IP address you have entered is already in use by another application. Please enter a different IP address
Please type a valid subnet mask address
There is a conflict between your IP, subnet mask and starting IP settings. This will result in failed connection. Do you want to keep the settings?
Only allowed users can connect to Internet
Press OK to delete the earliest one automatically or press Cancel to delete one manually.
Press to allow or block device connection request
Starting an Internet sharing connection will interrupt ongoing sending or receiving of MMS messages. Would you like to continue?
Starting a WLAN hotspot or Internet sharing connection will interrupt ongoing sending or receiving of MMS messages. Would you like to continue?
You can only use one Internet sharing feature at a time. Would you like to turn off Mobile Broadband Connect and turn on Mobile Hotspot?

You need the Mobile Hotspot feature from Verizon Wireless in order to use this service. While the Mobile Hotspot is active, on-device applications will continue to work and use the Mobile Hotspot data feature allowance.
Wi-Fi is currently active. Wi-Fi and Mobile Hotspot cannot run at the same time. Wi-Fi will be turned off.
Mobile Hotspot may use more battery. You may want to plug the phone into a power outlet.
Do not display this reminder in the future

"Portable Wi-Fi hotspot allows your Android-powered device to be used as a mobile hotspot for up to five devices using your phone’s data connection. If using this service, you should secure the connection to deny unauthorized access. This service consumes battery power and increases your data usage. This service requires a subscription to the applicable modem plan. Please ensure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Call 1-877-872-2249 if you need assistance. Use of service constitutes acceptance of the "Smartphone Modem Terms.
